successes.title: PebbleBee - The Most Affordable iOS/Android Bluetooth Device
successes.description: Support the Pebble Bee. The most affordable, secure and feature rich Bluetooth personal motion tracking device tag & wireless charging!

Pledges.description: Sneaker Peeker Deal - Get all the inside info and backer updates with a chance to contribute and add your comments on the PebbleBee project discussion board.
EARLY BEE - 1x PebbleBee Honey - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled PebbleBee with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.
One Honey: 1x PebbleBee Honey - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled PebbleBee with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

One Hornet: 1x PebbleBee Hornet - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

One Dragon: 1x PebbleBee Dragon - Qi Wireless Charging, Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Honey Beta Tester: 2x PebbleBee Honeys - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled PebbleBee with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.  Receive one early for beta testing, and then another with final backer shipment.  Add $16 for every additional PB.
Five Honey Light Pack: 5x PebbleBee Honeys - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled PebbleBee with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Hornet Beta Tester: 2x PebbleBee Hornets- Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.  Receive one early for beta testing, and then another with final backer shipment. Add $16 for every additional Honey, or $33 for every additional Hornet.

Six Honey/Hornet Mix Family Pack: 3x Honeys and 3x Hornets.  Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.  Hornets include 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass) and Temperature sensor.  Honeys ship separately in May.
Ten Honey Family Pack: 10x PebbleBee Honeys - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled PebbleBee with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Five Hornets: 5x PebbleBee Hornets - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Five Dragons: 5x PebbleBee Dragons & a Wireless Charger - Qi standard, Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Ten Honey/Hornet Mix Family Pack: 5x Honeys and 5x Hornets.  Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.  Hornets include 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass) and Temperature sensor.  Honeys ship separately in May.

Nine Honey/Hornet/Dragon Mix Family Pack: 3x Honeys, 3x Hornets and 3x Dragons. Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery. Hornets & Dragons include 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass) and Temperature sensor. Dragons are Qi Wireless Charging standard. Honeys ship separately in May.

Ten Hornets: 10x PebbleBee Hornets - Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Ten Hornet/Dragon Mix Family Pack: 5x Hornets & 5x Dragons. Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery. Hornets include 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass) and Temperature sensor.  Dragons are Qi Wireless Charging standard.

Ten Dragons (without charging base): 10x PebbleBee Dragons - Qi standard charging, Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.

Ten Dragons: 10x PebbleBee Dragons & a Wireless Charger - Qi standard, Bluetooth Low Energy enabled with 3 motion sensors (3-Axis gyroscope, 3-Axis Accelerometer and 3-Axis Compass), Temperature sensor, buzz speaker, spark LED, multi-function button and replaceable battery.
